languages.text: "Нет". {n}Стариковский шепот заползает вам в уши.{/n} "Тревога твоя не пуста: каждый отсек корабля нечистотой запятнан. Правильно и угодно Ему опасаться ее".
"No." {n}The Vizsier responds in a slithering whisper.{/n} "Your dread is not hollow: the unclean has sullied every bay on this ship. You are right to fear it. It is His will that you do."
languages.original_text: "Нет". {n}Стариковский шепот заползает вам в уши.{/n} "Тревога твоя не пуста: каждый отсек корабля нечистотой запятнан. Правильно и угодно Ему опасаться ее".

languages.text: «No». {n}El Visir responde en un susurro reptante.{/n} «Su temor no es vano: la impureza ha mancillado cada bahía de esta nave. Hace bien en temerla. Es Su voluntad que así lo haga».
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The Vizsier responds in a slithering whisper.{/n} "Your dread is not hollow: the unclean has sullied every bay on this ship. You are right to fear it. It is His will that you do."

traits.locale_text: «No». {n}El Visir responde en un susurro reptante.{/n} «Su temor no es vano: la impureza ha mancillado cada bahía de esta nave. Hace bien en temerla. Es Su voluntad que así lo haga».

languages.text: 「いや」{n}ヴィジールは、するりとした囁き声で答える。{/n}「あなたの恐怖は空虚なものではない。恐れるのは当然だ。そうすることがあの方の意志なのだから」
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The Vizsier responds in a slithering whisper.{/n} "Your dread is not hollow: the unclean has sullied every bay on this ship. You are right to fear it. It is His will that you do."

traits.locale_text: 「いや」{n}ヴィジールは、するりとした囁き声で答える。{/n}「あなたの恐怖は空虚なものではない。恐れるのは当然だ。そうすることがあの方の意志なのだから」

languages.text: “并非如此。”{n}宿老的声音宛如丝滑的耳语一般。{/n}“您的恐惧并非毫无根据。污秽之物已经玷污了这艘船的每片甲板。您惧怕它是理所应当的，这是祂的旨意。”
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The Vizsier responds in a slithering whisper.{/n} "Your dread is not hollow: the unclean has sullied every bay on this ship. You are right to fear it. It is His will that you do."

traits.locale_text: “并非如此。”{n}宿老的声音宛如丝滑的耳语一般。{/n}“您的恐惧并非毫无根据。污秽之物已经玷污了这艘船的每片甲板。您惧怕它是理所应当的，这是祂的旨意。”

languages.text: "Nein"{n}, antwortet der Wesir mit einem kriechenden Flüstern.{/n} "Eure Furcht ist nicht hohl: Das Unsaubere hat sämtliche Module auf diesem Schiff besudelt. Ihr tut gut daran, es zu fürchten. Es ist sein Wille, dass Ihr das tut."
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The Vizsier responds in a slithering whisper.{/n} "Your dread is not hollow: the unclean has sullied every bay on this ship. You are right to fear it. It is His will that you do."

traits.locale_text: "Nein"{n}, antwortet der Wesir mit einem kriechenden Flüstern.{/n} "Eure Furcht ist nicht hohl: Das Unsaubere hat sämtliche Module auf diesem Schiff besudelt. Ihr tut gut daran, es zu fürchten. Es ist sein Wille, dass Ihr das tut."

languages.text: « Non, {n}rétorque le vizir d'une voix sifflante.{/n} Votre peur n'est pas vaine, et l'abjection a d'ores et déjà contaminé l'ensemble du vaisseau. Vous avez raison de la craindre. Telle est Sa volonté. »
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The Vizsier responds in a slithering whisper.{/n} "Your dread is not hollow: the unclean has sullied every bay on this ship. You are right to fear it. It is His will that you do."

traits.locale_text: « Non, {n}rétorque le vizir d'une voix sifflante.{/n} Votre peur n'est pas vaine, et l'abjection a d'ores et déjà contaminé l'ensemble du vaisseau. Vous avez raison de la craindre. Telle est Sa volonté. »

languages.text: "Hayır." {n}Vezir, temkinli bir fısıltıyla yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Endişeniz yersiz değil. Günahkârlar, bu geminin her bir bölmesini lekeledi. Korkmakta haklısınız. Onun arzusu böyle buyuruyor."
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The Vizsier responds in a slithering whisper.{/n} "Your dread is not hollow: the unclean has sullied every bay on this ship. You are right to fear it. It is His will that you do."
